wolf.title: Moonlit Vanguard
wolf.lore: A sentinel born of moonshard stone who stalks the Sanctumâ€™s ridge lines and hunts nightmares before they ever reach the gates.
wolf.resonance: Moon Hunt with Owl reveals hidden creeps; Fang Current with Serpent lets arrows inherit poison marks.

owl.title: Chronal Watcher
owl.lore: An astral seer that suspends time itself, weaving stasis halos over the Dreamstream to slow anything that trespasses.
owl.resonance: Pairs with Wolf to expose stealth attacks and with Stag to seed healing pulses after stasis detonations.

stag.title: Grove Warden
stag.lore: Keeper of Verdant Pulse, its roots anchor blessings to the path and keep every guardian within the aura standing tall.
stag.resonance: Bulwark Bloom with Bear turns aura links into fortified conduit vines.

serpent.title: Oracle of Tides
serpent.lore: Channels venomed torrents that etch decay into nightmares, marking the path with toxic wakes for allies to exploit.
serpent.resonance: Fang Current with Wolf lets chain shots carry venom stacks down the line.

bear.title: Obsidian Bastion
bear.lore: A towering bulwark that drags spirit walls from the earth, daring nightmares to break themselves upon its shield.
bear.resonance: Obsidian Torrent with Serpent floods taunt walls with corrosive mist while Bulwark Bloom keeps the lane fortified.
